entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
